title: 15 - How to Read Your Bible
description:
Whether you're new to faith or been following God for 70 years, this episode is for you. We are going to go back to the basics. What is the Bible? How do we read it? Why does it matter?

Make this the year you learn how to read your Bible with your friends, do our latest IF:Equip study 'How to Read Your Bible' together for only $10: https://shoppe.ifgathering.com/products/how-to-read-your-bible-pdf

Our favorite audio Bible app that we know you'll love! Find it here: dwellapp.io/jennie
itunes:author: Jennie Allen
